describeservices.name: DescribeServices
describeservices.description: Grants permission to retrieve service details for all (paginated) services (if serviceCode is not set) or service detail for a particular service (if given serviceCode)

getattributevalues.name: GetAttributeValues
getattributevalues.description: Grants permission to retrieve all (paginated) possible values for a given attribute

getpricelistfileurl.name: GetPriceListFileUrl
getpricelistfileurl.description: Grants permission to retrieve the price list file URL for the given parameters

getproducts.name: GetProducts
getproducts.description: Grants permission to retrieve all matching products with given search criteria

listpricelists.name: ListPriceLists
listpricelists.description: Grants permission to list all (paginated) eligible price lists for the given parameters
